name: X (itch) (SWalrus)
description:
Controls:

  • Z to reset level
  • X to enter 'x'
  • Arrows - as usual

Made in 3 days as a submission to LowRezJam2019 with theme "text only".

Meet Adam, intelligent machine, locked inside a virtual environment. Don't miss a chance to interact with such innovative being changing his environment to his own needs. Everything will be OK. :]
